text: I'm Adam Rapoport from Bon Appetit
last summer Alex Grossman our creative
director and Carlo music our food
director jetted out to Colorado to Ralph
Lauren's double RL ranch kind of like
the most gorgeous place on earth soaring
mountains Cowboys horses and really
really good food so today we are making
the cover star of our June issue of Bon
Appetit the double RL Ranch burger
alright let's get started now the first
thing you need for a double RL burger is
Ralph's special sauce which is simply
mayonnaise ketchup little hot sauce a
little Worcestershire sauce onion powder
garlic powder some sweet relish some raw
minced red onions some Cornish aunt a
little mini French pickles a touch of
salt such a pepper and you just simply
mix it all up to incorporate it all
right a great burger is really easy to
make but it's also easy to screw up if
you don't follow a few key steps step
number one buy really good beef at Ralph
Lauren Polo bar in New York they use a
blend of Chuck brisket and short rib for
a really rich beefy flavor for the home
cook if you can't get a custom blend
like that what you want to zero in on is
fat content you want 20% then take a
handful about 6 ounces and don't work it
a lot just Pat it gently in to a patty
you can make a little well in the middle
because when a burger coats that sort of
plumps up don't over pack it you don't
want to tight dense burger you want to
loose crumbly juicy burger a little salt
on both sides and that is it keep it
simple now to the grill hot grill medium
high flame step number three do not
touch the burgers don't ever press them
down that releases all the juice and the
fat onto the coals you don't want that
let them sit for about five minutes and
then you're gonna flip it pretty
gorgeous I think that guy's a winner
right there perfect this is some fancy
sharp cheddar
if you're an American cheese guy or gal
that's all good love that stuff also and
then we're gonna put the top on to help
melt the cheese and I just wait okay
it's been about three minutes since we
put the cheese on we got our condiments
or buns ready to go got some tomato
lettuce pickles red onion bacon if you
wanted and of course Ralph's special
sauce who wants a burger okay
that is gorgeous further number one Oh
number two and the incredibly handsome
burger number three
that one's a perfect sort of medium rare
right there toppings that of course is
up to you I like red onion tomatoes if
they're in season a little lettuce but
that's it I like a lot of special sauce
there you go double RL ranch burger also
known as one of the best things on earth
I'm Adam Rapoport thanks for watching
